Resolve for procuring Hay for the Army, Massachusetts Assembly

Object Name
Text
Title
Resolve for procuring Hay for the Army, Massachusetts Assembly
Date
1776
Publisher
Benjamin Edes
Place of publication
Watertown, Massachusetts
Holding institution
Readex All Search
Description from holding institution
Early American Imprints, Series 1, no. 14874, p. 50-52.
Source
infoweb.newsbank.com
Copyright
No known copyright restrictions.
Notes
Tons of hay, both English and Salt, to be "carried to Roxbury Camp" listed within as part of the Massachusetts Assembly's "Resolve for procuring Hay for the Army."
